Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.data

Class InitialGameInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.data.Data
it.polimi.ingsw.model.data.GameInfo
it.polimi.ingsw.model.data.InitialGameInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InitialGameInfo extends GameInfo
InitialGameInfo is a class of GameInfo that is used to represents all the information regarding the current game state Is used every time a client connect to a game to initialize the view
